verses.verse: Then came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> certain <S%H582><s%> of the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> unto me, and sat <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me.
And the word <S%H1697><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> came unto me, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, these men <S%H582><s%> have set up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8689><s%> their idols <S%H1544><s%> in their heart <S%H3820><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the stumblingblock <S%H4383><s%> of their iniquity <S%H5771><s%> before <S%H5227><s%> their face <S%H6440><s%>: should I be enquired <S%H1875><s%> <S%H8735><s%> of at all <S%H1875><s%> <S%H8736><s%> by them?

Therefore speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8761><s%> unto them, and say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto them, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; Havahry man <S%H376><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> that setteth up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8686><s%> his idols <S%H1544><s%> in his heart <S%H3820><s%>, and putteth <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the stumblingblock <S%H4383><s%> of his iniquity <S%H5771><s%> before <S%H5227><s%> his face <S%H6440><s%>, and cometh <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to the prophet <S%H5030><s%>; I the YY <S%H3068><s%> will answer <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8738><s%> him that cometh <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> according to the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of his idols <S%H1544><s%>;

That I may take <S%H8610><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> in their own heart <S%H3820><s%>, because they are all estranged <S%H2114><s%> <S%H8738><s%> from me through their idols <S%H1544><s%>.

Therefore say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8798><s%> unto the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; Repent <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, and turn <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8685><s%> yourselves from your idols <S%H1544><s%>; and turn away <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8685><s%> your faces <S%H6440><s%> from all your abominations <S%H8441><s%>.

For every one <S%H376><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, or of the stranger <S%H1616><s%> that sojourneth <S%H1481><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, which separateth <S%H5144><s%> <S%H8735><s%> himself from me <S%H310><s%>, and setteth up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his idols <S%H1544><s%> in his heart <S%H3820><s%>, and putteth <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the stumblingblock <S%H4383><s%> of his iniquity <S%H5771><s%> before <S%H5227><s%> his face <S%H6440><s%>, and cometh <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to a prophet <S%H5030><s%> to enquire <S%H1875><s%> <S%H8800><s%> of him concerning me; I the YY <S%H3068><s%> will answer <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8737><s%> him by myself:

And I will set <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> against that man <S%H376><s%>, and will make <S%H8074><s%> <S%H8689><s%> him a sign <S%H226><s%> and a proverb <S%H4912><s%>, and I will cut him off <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8689><s%> from the midst <S%H8432><s%> of my people <S%H5971><s%>; and ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that I am the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

And if the prophet <S%H5030><s%> be deceived <S%H6601><s%> <S%H8792><s%> when he hath spoken <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> a thing <S%H1697><s%>, I the YY <S%H3068><s%> have deceived <S%H6601><s%> <S%H8765><s%> that prophet <S%H5030><s%>, and I will stretch out <S%H5186><s%> <S%H8804><s%> my hand <S%H3027><s%> upon him, and will destroy <S%H8045><s%> <S%H8689><s%> him from the midst <S%H8432><s%> of my people <S%H5971><s%> Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

And they shall bear <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the punishment of their iniquity <S%H5771><s%>: the punishment <S%H5771><s%> of the prophet <S%H5030><s%> shall be even as the punishment <S%H5771><s%> of him that seeketh <S%H1875><s%> <S%H8802><s%> unto him;

That the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> may go no more astray <S%H8582><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from me <S%H310><s%>, neither be polluted <S%H2930><s%> <S%H8691><s%> any more with all their transgressions <S%H6588><s%>; but that they may be my people <S%H5971><s%>, and I may be their 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>.
The word <S%H1697><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> came again to me, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, when the land <S%H776><s%> sinneth <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against me by trespassing <S%H4603><s%> <S%H8800><s%> grievously <S%H4604><s%>, then will I stretch out <S%H5186><s%> <S%H8804><s%> mine hand <S%H3027><s%> upon it, and will break <S%H7665><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the staff <S%H4294><s%> of the bread <S%H3899><s%> thereof, and will send <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8689><s%> famine <S%H7458><s%> upon it, and will cut off <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8689><s%> man <S%H120><s%> and beast <S%H929><s%> from it:

Though these three <S%H7969><s%> men <S%H582><s%>, Noach <S%H5146><s%>, Daniel <S%H1840><s%>, and I-yov <S%H347><s%>, were in it <S%H8432><s%>, they should deliver <S%H5337><s%> <S%H8762><s%> but their own souls <S%H5315><s%> by their righteousness <S%H6666><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>.

If <S%H3863><s%> I cause noisome <S%H7451><s%> beasts <S%H2416><s%> to pass through <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>, and they spoil <S%H7921><s%> <S%H8765><s%> it, so that it be desolate <S%H8077><s%>, that no man may pass through <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8802><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of the beasts <S%H2416><s%>:

Though these three <S%H7969><s%> men <S%H582><s%> were in it <S%H8432><s%>, as I live <S%H2416><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>, they shall deliver <S%H5337><s%> <S%H8686><s%> neither sons <S%H1121><s%> nor daughters <S%H1323><s%>; they only shall be delivered <S%H5337><s%> <S%H8735><s%>, but the land <S%H776><s%> shall be desolate <S%H8077><s%>.

Or if I bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> a sword <S%H2719><s%> upon that land <S%H776><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, Sword <S%H2719><s%>, go through <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>; so that I cut off <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8689><s%> man <S%H120><s%> and beast <S%H929><s%> from it:

Though these three <S%H7969><s%> men <S%H582><s%> were in it <S%H8432><s%>, as I live <S%H2416><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>, they shall deliver <S%H5337><s%> <S%H8686><s%> neither sons <S%H1121><s%> nor daughters <S%H1323><s%>, but they only shall be delivered <S%H5337><s%> <S%H8735><s%> themselves.

Or if I send <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8762><s%> a pestilence <S%H1698><s%> into that land <S%H776><s%>, and pour out <S%H8210><s%> <S%H8804><s%> my fury <S%H2534><s%> upon it in blood <S%H1818><s%>, to cut off <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8687><s%> from it man <S%H120><s%> and beast <S%H929><s%>:

Though Noach <S%H5146><s%>, Daniel <S%H1840><s%>, and I-yov <S%H347><s%>, were in it <S%H8432><s%>, as I live <S%H2416><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>, they shall deliver <S%H5337><s%> <S%H8686><s%> neither son <S%H1121><s%> nor <S%H518><s%> daughter <S%H1323><s%>; they shall but deliver <S%H5337><s%> <S%H8686><s%> their own souls <S%H5315><s%> by their righteousness <S%H6666><s%>.

For thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; How much more when I send <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8765><s%> my four <S%H702><s%> sore <S%H7451><s%> judgments <S%H8201><s%> upon Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>, the sword <S%H2719><s%>, and the famine <S%H7458><s%>, and the noisome <S%H7451><s%> beast <S%H2416><s%>, and the pestilence <S%H1698><s%>, to cut off <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8687><s%> from it man <S%H120><s%> and beast <S%H929><s%> ?

Yet, behold, therein shall be left <S%H3498><s%> <S%H8738><s%> a remnant <S%H6413><s%> that shall be brought forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8716><s%>, both sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters <S%H1323><s%>: behold, they shall come forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8802><s%> unto you, and ye shall see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%> their way <S%H1870><s%> and their doings <S%H5949><s%>: and ye shall be comforted <S%H5162><s%> <S%H8738><s%> concerning the evil <S%H7451><s%> that I have brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H8689><s%> upon Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>, even concerning all that I have brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H8689><s%> upon it.

And they shall comfort <S%H5162><s%> <S%H8765><s%> you, when ye see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> their ways <S%H1870><s%> and their doings <S%H5949><s%>: and ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that I have not done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> without cause <S%H2600><s%> all that I have done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in it, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>.
